EmailTemplate.name: Email Template for Add the finding partners
EmailTemplate.subject: Add the finding partners
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Receiving_User.Name},
You have a pending task to add the Finding Partners to the Enquiry team. Please click on the following link to access the enquiry on LinKreta,
{!Task.Link}
Note:- This is a system generated email. Please do not reply to this mail.
